item.title: Red Hat OpenShift Self Service
item.description: The goals of operations and development teams continue to be orthogonal. For operations, scale and stability remain the primary drivers, while for development teams it is innovation and differentiation. Bridging this chasm is the key to creating a platform that can meet the needs of both organizations simultaneously â€” in other words, delivering a platform that provides innovation at scale.
